item.title: React Pixi.js Development Part 1
item.description: Afternoon, For the past few months, I have been wanting to get into game development for quite some time. It was one of my passions as a kid, but I never thought I could do it until now. As stated earlier, I am a web developer, with a little over 1 year of developer experience. Every time I have tried, I got a little frustrated due to very high inconsistencies with an entire game engine framework vs.

item.title: Personal Developer Equipment
item.description: Afternoon, I thought as an Initial post I would create a post talking about my development gear. From time to time, I always get people asking me why I choose to use my certain laptop, keyboard, etc. and I thought this would be a great time to give a rundown on why I use it, and why I have not upgraded in a long time. As a tl;dr, here is a simple rundown:

item.title: Personal NAS / Plex / E-book server - Part 1
item.description: Afternoon, Today, I wanted to talk about a future plan I have going on right now. Recently, I had found a Dell R640 for VERY cheap, but my main issue is where the server rack is located, I can not have it running at certain times, as it is very very loud. I am currently in the process of moving this specific server to a place where noise wouldn’t be an issue.
